amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-559 to ensure the Department of Justice's Disability Rights Section takes action, to the extent practicable, to make ADA compliance publications available in languages commonly used by owners and operators of U.S. businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
